Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah, I noticed a relic at the rear of
the chamber. It looked like there was
something inside.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Although noticing it is as far as I've
gotten. I haven't figured out yet how
to pry it open.
Talk_045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>What's with that face? Hang on...<sp:5:1:0>
Are you saying you found more?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you discover this time?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>What's going on? You have this look on
your face like there's big news you can't
wait to share.
Talk_046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Link... <sp:5:0:0>You're making that "wait until you
see what I found" face again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you discover this time?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whaaaaaat?! You found a way to open
that relic?!<sp:0:4:0>How in Hyrule did you— Wait, no, that's
not important right now. Better question.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you reel in?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You've got to show me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>I think your discoveries have brought us
a step closer to solving the riddle.<sp:0:4:0>That "wear the electric garb" part of the
code...<sp:5:0:0> It could be about the garments
from the age of legends that you found.
Talk_048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Right. <sp:5:0:0>Let's go over the code one more
time and see if it shakes anything loose.
Talk_013: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>You got that relic in the back open?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What was inside?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_049:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>"Wear the electric garb hidden at long-
necked dragons along the wide-mouthed
forest serpent.<sp:0:4:0>"Offer a Zonai charge to the altar at
the tail."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I recall hearing a song once that likened
the <clr:0000>Dracozu River<clr:ffff> to a forest dragon.
Could be the same thing here.<sp:0:4:0>Both this ruin and the ones where you
found the garments were marked by those
<clr:0000>tall dragon pillars<clr:ffff>.
Talk_060:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whaaaaaat?! You found a relic in another
ruin? And you managed to open it?!<sp:0:4:0>How in Hyrule did you— Wait, no, that's
not important right now. Better question.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you reel in?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You've got to show me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait just a minute... That outfit you've
got on...<sp:0:4:0>Isn't that the same thing the figure in
the mural is wearing?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Where in Hyrule did you find that?
Talk_061: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>You got that relic in this ruin open?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What was inside?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still, your outfit isn't exactly like what we
see in the mural. Hmm...<sp:0:4:0>Maybe there are other <clr:0000>treasure chests
containing the rest of the garments<clr:ffff>.
Talk_062:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You found a relic in another ruin...and
managed to open it?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you reel in?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>You've got to show me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>You've done it again, Link. I shouldn't be
so astonished by your feats at this point,
but it gets me every time.<sp:0:4:0>Treasure belongs to the one who finds it,
so that's yours!
Talk_063:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Look at you! You're the spitting image of
the figure in the mural!<sp:0:4:0>Now that you've found three garments,
you could cover yourself head to toe
in them.<sp:0:4:0>Actually...<sp:5:0:0>might make you look even more
like the mural.<sp:0:4:0>Link... <sp:5:0:0>You mind trying on the full set you
found? Just humor me here.
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then...we still need to figure out the
rest of the code on this relief.
Talk_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Maybe it's a poem? <sp:5:0:0>Or some kind of...<sp:5:1:0>
<clr:0000>code<clr:ffff>, perhaps?
Talk_064:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Now that you've found three garments in
those chests, <sp:5:0:0>would you humor me and
put them all on at once?
Talk_065:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Maybe...hmm. <sp:5:0:0>The "forest serpent" bit
does remind me of a song that compared
the <clr:0000>Dracozu River <clr:ffff>to a forest dragon.<sp:0:4:0>But anyway, there's more to this code.
I'll keep reading.
Talk_030:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive>We've got the garb. Now if we could just
crack the rest of the riddles in this <clr:0000>code<clr:ffff>,
I bet even greater discoveries await us!
Talk_031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It might be a good idea to go back to
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>and discuss it with him.
Talk_032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It might be a good idea to go to the
<clr:0000>Hateno Village lab <clr:ffff>and discuss it with him.
Talk_033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The treasure chest you opened had a
genuine garment from the age of legends.<sp:0:4:0>What's more, it matches the garb the
figure in the relief is wearing. Or part of
it, at least.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'd bet you anything there are other
chests out there with garments inside.
Talk_034:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Huh? Wow...<sp:5:0:0>you're saying you already
have the <clr:0000>sensor +<clr:ffff> feature?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>That should make our search for treasure
chests much easier!
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aha! You came after all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I figured you would after you made that
breakthrough at the Ring Ruins.<sp:0:4:0>But listen to this! I've already got a
whopper of a discovery on my hook here!
Talk_035:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The problem is, <clr:0000>searching for treasure
chests <clr:ffff>without a plan is a long shot.<sp:0:4:0>Robbie was talking about creating some
way that would <clr:0000>make searching for things
simple<clr:ffff> though.
Talk_036:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Next, it says...<sp:5:0:0> "Offer a Zonai charge to
the altar at the tail."<sp:0:4:0>I'm pretty sure I got that right, but I have
no idea what it means.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>What in the world is a Zonai charge?<sp:5:0:0>
And where is this tail with an altar?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If we can crack all the riddles in this code,
I'm sure that even greater discoveries
await us!
Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>It's a Zonai mural, complete with intact
text. The style is unmistakable.<sp:0:4:0>It's nothing short of miraculous that it's
still here and basically intact!<sp:0:4:0>Which, come to think of it, might be
ascribable to the Zonai's advanced
technology.<sp:0:4:0>I've got a fair bit of knowledge of the
script, so I just had a try at deciphering it.<sp:0:4:0>But some of it still eludes me.
Talk_038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Much as I want to crack this code, <sp:5:0:0>I'm
also dying to know what's in that <clr:0000>chest<clr:ffff>
I found in the back of the room there.
Talk_039:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm very curious to know what's in that
chest, <sp:5:0:0>but I haven't forgotten about
cracking the <clr:0000>code <clr:ffff>written on the mural.
Talk_050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>"Wear the electric garb" might mean the
garments from the age of legends that
you found, Link.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But "offer a Zonai charge to the altar at
the tail"? <sp:5:1:0>What's a Zonai charge? And
where is this tail with an altar?<sp:0:4:0>Could another <clr:0000>tall dragon pillar <clr:ffff>be
marking the altar site, just like the
others you've found?
Talk_051:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But that still leaves us with the other
part—<sp:5:0:0>"Offer a Zonai charge to the altar
at the tail."<sp:0:4:0>What is a Zonai charge? <sp:5:1:0>And this altar at
the tail... <sp:5:0:0>Where do we start looking for it?<sp:0:4:0>Could another <clr:0000>tall dragon pillar <clr:ffff>be
marking the altar site, just like the
others you've found?
Talk_006: <sp:3:0:2:0701>There's one other thing I'm curious about.
Talk_052:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hmm? Sorry, I've been focused on
deciphering this code. <sp:5:0:0>Say, Link, that
outfit you've got on...<sp:0:4:0>Isn't that the same thing the figure in
the mural is wearing?!<sp:0:4:0>Where in Hyrule did you find that?
Talk_053:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>In a chest in the back of this chamber?
But if that's true...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>There's nothing else it could be but a
garment from the age of legends!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Now that's a haul to remember!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>If we can crack all the riddles in this <clr:0000>code<clr:ffff>,
I'm sure that even greater discoveries
await us!<sp:0:4:0>But I'm also dying to know what's in that
<clr:0000>treasure chest<clr:ffff> I found in the back of the
room there.
Talk_054:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>In the chest I told you about earlier?
But if that's true...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>There's nothing else it could be but a
garment from the age of legends!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Now that's a haul to remember!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>"Wear the electric garb hidden at long-
necked dragons along the wide-mouthed
forest serpent.<sp:0:4:0>"Offer a Zonai charge to the altar at
the tail."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>You know, the tall pillars <clr:0000>found around<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>these ruins<clr:ffff> had dragon designs. <sp:5:0:0>But what
does the bit about "forest serpent" mean?
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal>I heard a song once that compared the
<clr:0000>Dracozu River<clr:ffff> to a forest dragon. Could
that be related?<sp:0:4:0>What is a Zonai charge though? <sp:5:0:0>And
where's this tail with an altar it mentions?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh. I'm confident I'm translating this
right, but I still don't understand.
Talk_055:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still, your outfit isn't exactly like what we
see in the mural. Hmm...<sp:0:4:0>Wasn't there a relic in this chamber too?
Maybe it's related to the other one
you found.
Talk_021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Here, I'll read it out loud so we can both
get on the same page.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>This first part says, <sp:5:0:0>"Wear the electric
garb hidden at long-necked dragons along
the wide-mouthed forest serpent."<sp:0:4:0>What do you make of "forest serpent" and
"dragons" there?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>To me, it calls to mind the tall pillars
<clr:0000>found around these ruins<clr:ffff> designed to
look like dragons.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>"Forest serpent" though... I haven't seen
any designs like that.<sp:0:4:0>What am I missing? What other "wide-
mouthed forest serpent" is there?
Talk_056:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>If we can crack all the riddles in this <clr:0000>code<clr:ffff>,
I'm sure that even greater discoveries
await us!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>But I'm very interested in that clothing
you found.<sp:0:4:0>I think there's a good chance that the
<clr:0000>chest <clr:ffff>at the back of the chamber has
something to do with that garb.
Talk_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I should've mentioned this, but I found
one more Zonai relic at the back of
these ruins.<sp:0:4:0>Judging from the shape, I think there's
something inside, but I can't get it
to open.
Talk_057:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Look at you! You're the spitting image of
the figure in the mural!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Although...the more I look, the more it
seems like you're not quite there yet.<sp:0:4:0>Wasn't there a relic in this chamber too?
Maybe it's related to the one you found.
Talk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Can't crack the code... Can't get the box
open... This just isn't my day.
Talk_058:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The treasure chest you opened had a
genuine garment from the age of legends.<sp:0:4:0>What's more, it matches the garb the
figure in the relief is wearing. Or part of
it, at least.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's possible that the chest in this room
has something to do with that garb too.
Talk_059:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whaaaaaat?! You found a way to open
the relic in here?!<sp:0:4:0>How in Hyrule did you— Wait, no, that's
not important right now. Better question.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What did you reel in?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You've got to show me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You look like you could have stepped right
out of that mural! It's like I'm talking to
someone from the age of legends.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>No one makes discovery after discovery
quite like you, Link. You've done it again!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>This is all so exciting!
Talk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>In a chest you found in these ruins?
But if that's true...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>There's nothing else it could be but a
garment from the age of legends!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Now that's a haul to remember!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ooh! So I was right—there were other
garments in the set after all!
Talk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>If we can crack all the riddles in this <clr:0000>code<clr:ffff>,
I'm sure that even greater discoveries
await us!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>But I'm very interested in that clothing
you found.<sp:0:4:0>Who knows? It might not be the only
<clr:0000>chest <clr:ffff>with garb like that inside.
Talk_040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Don't forget about the <clr:0000>code<clr:ffff> written on
the relief. I want to get the bottom of
those mysteries too.
Talk_029:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Look at you! You're the spitting image of
the figure in the mural!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Although...the more I look, the more it
seems like you're not quite there yet.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe we haven't found all the
<clr:0000>treasure chests<clr:ffff>...
Talk_041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're curious about it too, huh? <sp:5:0:0>Let's go
over it one more time.
Talk_042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You already have the <clr:0000>sensor +<clr:ffff> feature
that Robbie designed, right?<sp:0:4:0>That should make our search for treasure
chests much easier.
Talk_043:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>You look like the fish that got away
with the worm. Wait...<sp:5:1:0>did you make
another discovery?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What is it this time?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_044:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Link... <sp:5:0:0>You're making that "you won't
believe what I found" face again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>What is it this time?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't leave me on the hook!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
